ISO_7010_W005.title: Non-ionizing radiation

ISO_7010_W004.description: To warn of a laser beam
ISO_7010_W004.behaviour: Taking care to avoid exposure to a laser beam
ISO_7010_W004.imageContentDescription: Circle with 24 regular equally spaced radiating lines, 12 shorter of equal length, 11 longer of equal length and one longer reaching horizontally the right-hand side of the triangle
ISO_7010_W004.title: Laser beam

ISO_7010_P020.description: To prohibit use of lift in the event of fire

ISO_7010_P020.title: Do not use lift in the event of fire

ISO_7010_P021.behaviour: Not taking dogs into a designated area
ISO_7010_P021.hazard: Infections due to dogs; harming of people caused by dog bites
ISO_7010_P021.title: No dogs

ISO_7010_P022.behaviour: Not eating or drinking in the designated area
ISO_7010_P022.hazard: Ingestion of dangerous substances by food and drink contaminated at a designated area
ISO_7010_P022.imageContentDescription: Three horizontal lines alongside a cup with straw
ISO_7010_P022.title: No eating or drinking

ISO_7010_P023.description: To prohibit the obstruction of a designated clear area

ISO_7010_P023.hazard: Obstruction in a designated clear area
ISO_7010_P023.title: Do not obstruct

ISO_7010_P024.description: To prohibit walking or standing on a designated area
ISO_7010_P024.hazard: Areas which are unsafe for people to walk or stand on
ISO_7010_P024.title: Do not walk or stand here

ISO_7010_P025.description: To prohibit the use of scaffolding systems which are not complete
ISO_7010_P025.imageContentDescription: Human figure (right-hand profile) walking on a broken horizontal bar surrounded by vertical and horizontal lines
ISO_7010_P025.title: Do not use this incomplete scaffold

ISO_7010_P026.description: To prohibit the use of unsuitable electrical equipment in or near water
ISO_7010_P026.behaviour: Not using electrically powered equipment in bathtubs, showers or water-filled reservoirs
ISO_7010_P026.title: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower or water-filled reservoir

ISO_7010_P027.description: To prohibit the use of the lift for the transportation of people
ISO_7010_P027.behaviour: Not using the lift for the transportation of people
ISO_7010_P027.hazard: Goods or freight lifts without the safety features necessary for the transportation of people

ISO_7010_P027.title: Do not use this lift for people

ISO_7010_E019.description: To signify that the doorknob of a security door on an escape route must be turned in a clockwise direction in order for the opening device to operate
ISO_7010_E019.behaviour: Turning the doorknob in a clockwise direction in order to open a door on an escape route which has a security lock, in the event of an emergency
ISO_7010_E019.hazard: Being unable to open a door on an escape route which has a security lock and an emergency opening device, in the event of an emergency
ISO_7010_E019.category: Evacuation route, location of safety equipment or safety facility, safety action
ISO_7010_E019.title: Turn clockwise to open

ISO_7010_W003.imageContentDescription: Circle with three circular sectors around it
ISO_7010_W003.title: Radioactive material or ionizing radiation

ISO_7010_P029.description: To prohibit the taking of photographs

ISO_7010_P029.title: No photography
